long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Merge Cyber Racers is an exciting game available as a Chrome Extension. In this game, players merge and upgrade futuristic racing cars to create the ultimate racing team. The goal is to assemble a powerful squad of cyber racers and compete in thrilling races against other players or AI opponents.

The gameplay involves merging cars of the same level to unlock higher-tier vehicles with enhanced stats and abilities. As you progress through the game, you'll earn rewards and unlock new tracks to test your skills. Strategic decision-making is crucial as you need to balance merging cars for power and managing resources efficiently.

*Note: We have added "Classroom 6x" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website! https://classroom-6x.org/, https://leveldevil.net/
